tasks.label: Flash Combined
args: cargo build --target thumbv6m-none-eabi -p crispy-bootloader -p crispy-fw-sample && ./scripts/build-combined.sh debug && probe-rs download --chip RP2040 --binary-format bin --base-address 0x10000000 target/thumbv6m-none-eabi/debug/combined.bin

tasks.label: Flash and Boot Combined
args: cargo build --target thumbv6m-none-eabi -p crispy-bootloader -p crispy-fw-sample && ./scripts/build-combined.sh debug && probe-rs download --chip RP2040 --binary-format bin --base-address 0x10000000 target/thumbv6m-none-eabi/debug/combined.bin && probe-rs reset --chip RP2040 && sleep 3
